title: Please Explain the grade system!
body: I went 17/0/16 as {{champion:31}}  and I got an A as my grade. I also remember going 4/2/6 as {{champion:72}}  this other game except that time I got an S as my grade. Something must be wrong here explain if you know how the grade system works please! Thank you for taking the time for reading this post =)

replies.body:
It doesn't just account for k/d/a. The grade system also accounts for objectives taken by you and your team. This includes dragon kills, baron nashor kills, towers and inhbitor kills. 
Creep Score is also accounted.
The grading isn't all about kda it is your objectives too I got 6/2 with sivir and got grade S- because I was farming a lot and getting towers.

that must explain the S+ yasuo games that went 14-27/0/5-9 then.

 
> I'm challenjour trust me 

I don't, your just a 
> BjergWannabe    

and Wannabe's only wannabe. 

> deaths and assists is all that counts!

Dumbest thing ever, if your 5-37 you can still win if you have more objectives. 3 inhibs is worth more than 40 kills imo
its not about ur KDA. its all aspects of the game- buying wards, kills PARTICIPATED in compared to the whole team etc
